blocks.title: About FleetGoo
blocks.subtitle: Leading the future of intelligent fleet management. With over a decade of expertise in vehicle tracking technology, we provide cutting-edge hardware and software solutions to businesses worldwide.

items.title: Industry Excellence
items.desc: Award-winning technology recognized globally for innovation and reliability.

items.title: Customer First
items.desc: 24/7 multilingual support and a dedicated service team committed to your success.

items.title: Global Reach
items.desc: Serving customers in over 85 countries with localized solutions and support.

items.title: Innovation
items.desc: Continuous R&D investment ensuring our products stay ahead of market trends.

items.title: Our Vision
items.desc: To be the leading provider of automotive digitalization technology and operational services.

items.title: Our Mission
items.desc: Making the Internet of Vehicles simpler and car life better.

items.title: Premium Components Only
items.desc: Quality starts at the source. We strictly source from Tier-1 suppliers and perform rigorous Incoming Quality Control (IQC) to ensure no refurbished or counterfeit parts ever enter our production line.

items.title: Precision Engineering & Rigorous QC
items.desc: We don't just assemble; we engineer quality. Every PCB undergoes component-level inspection and testing before it becomes a FleetGoo device.

items.title: AI Algorithm Calibration
items.desc: Smart detection, reliable alerts. We rigorously calibrate our ADAS & DMS algorithms to ensure precise recognition of fatigue, distraction, and road risks.

items.title: Heavy-duty Video Processing
items.desc: Stability is our priority. Our MDVRs undergo 72-hour full-load recording tests with 4/8-channel 1080P input to ensure rock-solid stability even under extreme load.
